Package dev.javafp.util

Class ExecutorWithExceptions

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor
dev.javafp.util.ExecutorWithExceptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executor, ExecutorService
public class ExecutorWithExceptions extends ThreadPoolExecutor

This class is a subclass of ThreadPoolExecutor that displays any uncaught exception that is thrown when running in a thread
